userFeedback.question: Did you find this information useful?

hero.title: TAKE ACTION
hero.description: Tackling air pollution starts with each and every one of us. Learn about the actions you can take to reduce your emission and protect the health of your loved ones.
hero.mobileDescription: Tackling air pollution starts with each and every one of us. Learn about the actions you can take to reduce your emission and protect the health of your loved ones.

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Please donate to Breathe Mongolia! Your generous donation would help Breathe Mongolia educate adults and children about air pollution, how to protect their health, and help reduce pollution.
donate.donateMore: Learn more about donations to BM

subscribe.mobileDescription: We’re social! Follow us on social media, expand your network, and help raise awareness about air pollution in Mongolia.
subscribe.title: Stay Connected
subscribe.description: Join our mailing list and follow us on social media.
subscribe.slack: Join Agaar Neg community on Slack
subscribe.footerPlaceHolder: Enter your email to receive our newsletters

join.title: Join Our Cause
join.description: Our work depends on the hard-working, genuine volunteers that dedicate their time to the organization. Sign up to volunteer!
join.volunteer: Sign up to be a volunteer

download.title: Download Resources
download.description: Download resources to educate yourself, your family, and to prevent against harmful effects of air pollution.
download.mobileDescription: Download resources to educate yourself, your family, and to prevent against harmful effects of air pollution.
